title: Why does the client randomly decide to update?
body:
"The client update has begun!" it says, launching my client update for the fifth time since it launched. Right now it's holding me hostage from rejoining a game after the power went out, and I'll probably get a ban or something since I'm not rejoining. 

Any way to stop it from updating so often?

replies.body: After that power outage, it's likely that some of the game files were damaged when it crashed unexpectedly. If that update finishes but keeps restarting itself, you may need to grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **force repatch** to force a manual update as opposed to the automated one.
